channel.title: Need Item command!
channel.description: I need the ::item command on my source only the people with the names like (zilla) and stuff i want to change so admins can use it!!!

item.title: Need Item command!
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights >= 2) {

Start your command with that, and use your default ::item command with it.

Off Topic: If I were on my home computer, I would post a full item command for you,

Read full topic

item.title: Need Item command!
item.dc:creator: @RingedPure RingedPure
item.description:
@RingedPure wrote:

Edit: Wait, if you say only some people can use it, just change the part where it says the names like on my serv

&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ringed")) {

to && (playerRights >= 2)) {

Two is the player rights for admins, and the beggining of the code basically says "if an admin does ::item spawn him an item on his co-ordinates.

                   Hope this helps!

Read full topic
